alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones, northwestern Onslow and southeastern Duplin Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Albert J Ellis Airport, or 10 miles west of Half Moon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Half Moon, Richlands, Cypress Creek, Catherine Lake, Comfort, Petersburg, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Lyman and Loco VFD. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
